abstract.t: This document presents a new alternative way of implementing discussion forums other than NNTP and mailing lists. It is largely based on standard e-mail except for retrieval. The purpose of this new protocol is to atenuate the bandwidth and net resources needed by either NNTP and mailing lists. Based on implementation experience by me and Kovisoft, the remote moderator capabilities have been rewriten (in fact this was because I conceived a better way).
